alert.note: Alert for Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 04 at 1:23AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Clay, Jefferson, Randolph, Shelby, Talladega and Walker. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple rounds of showers and thunderstorms are possible through mid-day Friday. Total rainfall amounts of 1-3 inches with locally higher amounts may result in isolated flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
